TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Certificate2Collection extends System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 當<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>會開啟存放區中，結果由<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>物件。 如果您熟悉的未受管理的密碼編譯 API 建構，您可以想像<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>作為記憶體存放區的<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件。
## Examples 下列程式碼中，開啟目前使用者的個人憑證存放區、 選取有效的憑證、 可讓使用者選取憑證，並再寫入至主控台的 憑證和憑證鏈結的資訊。 輸出取決於使用者選取的憑證。
[!code-cpp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class without any information.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立空<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>物件，它是不同的其他建構函式使用憑證或集合的資訊來建立物件。
## Examples 下列程式碼中，開啟目前使用者的個人憑證存放區、 選取有效的憑證、 可讓使用者選取憑證，並再寫入至主控台的 憑證和憑證鏈結的資訊。 輸出取決於使用者選取的憑證。

## Remarks 這個方法會加入<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件加入至集合並傳回憑證的索引位置。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟 X.509 憑證存放區、 新增和刪除憑證，，然後關閉 存放區的資料。 這裡假設您有三個憑證，以加入和移除從本機存放區。
[!code-cpp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CPP/x509store2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/CS/x509store2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509store2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509store2/vb/x509store2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您有一個陣列，請使用這個方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>要加入至物件<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>物件。 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>方法處理要求交易，因此，如果單一新增或移除失敗，整個作業就會中止。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您已將憑證使用這個方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>物件，您想要新增到另一個<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>物件。 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>方法處理要求交易，因此，如果單一新增或移除失敗，整個作業就會中止。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間成正比<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>屬性。 亦即，這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>。
這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

Docs.summary: Exports X.509 certificate information based on content type into a byte array.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] Export(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType contentType) cil managed
Public Function Export (contentType As X509ContentType) As Byte()

Docs.param: A supported object.
Docs.summary: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法支援內容類型，不需要輸入密碼。

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] Export (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType contentType, string password);
.method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] Export(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType contentType, string password) cil managed
Public Function Export (contentType As X509ContentType, password As String) As Byte()

Docs.param: A supported object.
A string used to protect the byte array.
Docs.summary: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array using a password.
Docs.returns: X.509 certificate information in a byte array.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法支援下列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>類型：
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Cert>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pfx>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedStore>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pkcs7>

Docs.exception: The certificate is unreadable, the content is invalid or, in the case of a certificate requiring a password, the private key could not be exported because the password provided was incorrect.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此方法來尋找<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件如果不需要任何使用者互動。 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.Find%2A>方法，以允許使用者選取<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件。
請注意，可以在階層式或巢狀的樣式，縮小搜尋準則的每個呼叫的方法範圍中使用這個方法。
## Examples 下列程式碼中，開啟目前使用者的個人憑證存放區、 找到有效的憑證、 可讓使用者選取憑證，並再寫入至主控台的 憑證和憑證鏈結的資訊。 輸出取決於使用者選取的憑證。
[!code-cpp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[certselect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert>

MemberSignature.Value: public void Import (byte[] rawData, string password, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags keyStorageFlags);
.method public hidebysig instance void Import(unsigned int8[] rawData, string password, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags keyStorageFlags) cil managed
Public Sub Import (rawData As Byte(), password As String, keyStorageFlags As X509KeyStorageFlags)
public: void Import(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rawData, System::String ^ password, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509KeyStorageFlags keyStorageFlags);

Docs.param: A byte array containing data from an object.
The password required to access the certificate information.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
Docs.summary: Imports a certificate, in the form of a byte array that requires a password to access the certificate, into a object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法可以搭配 PFX/PKCS12 二進位大型物件 (BLOB) 有密碼保護。 您可以建立 PFX/PKCS12 BLOB 中的憑證相關聯的金鑰容器和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>值可用來控制這個程序。 請注意，是否您未建立的金鑰容器，私密金鑰不會保存。
這個方法會將憑證的位元組陣列匯憑證的集合。 這個方法支援下列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>類型：
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Cert>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pfx>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedStore>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pkcs7>

MemberSignature.Value: public void Import (string fileName, string password, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags keyStorageFlags);
.method public hidebysig instance void Import(string fileName, string password, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags keyStorageFlags) cil managed
Public Sub Import (fileName As String, password As String, keyStorageFlags As X509KeyStorageFlags)
public: void Import(System::String ^ fileName, System::String ^ password, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509KeyStorageFlags keyStorageFlags);

Docs.param: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
The password required to access the certificate information.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
Docs.summary: Imports a certificate file that requires a password into a object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法可以搭配 PFX/PKCS12 檔案或其他憑證檔案，需要密碼。 您可以建立 PFX/PKCS12 檔案中的憑證相關聯的金鑰容器和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>值可用來控制這個程序。 請注意，是否您未建立的金鑰容器，私密金鑰不會保存。
請注意 PFX/PKCS12 檔案可包含多個憑證。 這個方法會匯入私用的索引鍵相關聯的第一個憑證，或如果沒有私密金鑰找到，則第一個找到的憑證。
這個方法支援下列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>類型：
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Cert>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedCert>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pfx>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.SerializedStore>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Pkcs7>
- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType.Authenticode>

如果`index`等於<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>，`certificate`加入至集合結尾。
